languages.text: "Если на то будет ваша воля, мы пресечем любые нарушения корабельной дисциплины. Однако смею отметить, что Инфернус-мастер не вправе командовать блюстителями, и я нахожу его действия возмутительным нарушением субординации!"

"Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"
languages.original_text: "Если на то будет ваша воля, мы пресечем любые нарушения корабельной дисциплины. Однако смею отметить, что Инфернус-мастер не вправе командовать блюстителями, и я нахожу его действия возмутительным нарушением субординации!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

"Lord Captain, this is Master-at-Arms speaking. If it is your will, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous violation of the chain of command!"

"Lord Captain, this is the Master-at-Arms speaking. If it be your wish, we shall crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

"Lord Captain, this is the Master-at-Arms speaking. If it be your wish, we shall crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

"Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

"Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

"Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, si lo desea, castigaremos toda violación de la disciplina de la nave. No obstante, ¡me atrevo a decir que el maestro de infernus no tiene derecho a dar órdenes a los guardias y considero sus acciones un incumplimiento descarado de la cadena de mando!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, al habla la maestra de armas. Si lo desea, castigaremos toda violación de la disciplina de la nave. No obstante, ¡me atrevo a decir que el maestro de infernus no tiene derecho a dar órdenes a los guardias y considero sus acciones un incumplimiento descarado de la cadena de mando!».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、それがお望みでしたら、あらゆる船内の規律違反を取り締まりましょう。しかし、あえて言わせていただきますが、インフェルヌス・マスターにはエンフォーサーを指揮する権利はありません。彼の行為は、指揮系統に反する言語道断の行為だ！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、こちらマスター・アット・アーム。それがお望みでしたら、あらゆる船内の規律違反を取り締まりましょう。しかし、あえて言わせていただきますが、インフェルヌス・マスターにはエンフォーサーに指揮する権利はありません。彼の行為は、指揮系統に反する言語道断の行為だ！」

languages.text: “舰长大人，如果您愿意的话，我们将会彻查这艘船上所有区域，严厉打击一切违纪行为。但我可以这么说，控火大师无权对执法者下达命令。我认为，他的行为是在破坏船上的指挥系统！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这里是戒律大师。如果您愿意的话，我们将会彻查这艘船上所有区域，严厉打击一切违纪行为。但我可以这么说，控火大师无权对执法者下达命令。我认为，他的行为是在破坏船上的指挥系统！”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wenn Ihr wünscht, schlagen wir jede Verletzung der Schiffsdisziplin nieder. Allerdings möchte ich darauf hinweisen, dass der Infernus-Meister keine Befehlsgewalt über die Enforcer hat und ich sein Handeln für einen unerhörten Eingriff in die Befehlskette halte!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, hier spricht der Waffenmeister. Wenn Ihr wünscht, schlagen wir jede Verletzung der Schiffsdisziplin nieder. Allerdings möchte ich darauf hinweisen, dass der Infernus-Meister keine Befehlsgewalt über die Enforcers hat und ich sein Handeln für einen unerhörten Eingriff in die Befehlskette halte!"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Si c'est là votre souhait, nous pouvons faire preuve de plus de sévérité envers quiconque est pris en train d'enfreindre la discipline de ce vaisseau. Je tiens cependant à préciser que les prévôts ne sont pas aux ordres du maître-infernus, et que ses actions constituent une violation scandaleuse de la chaîne de commandement ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, ici la capitaine d'armes. Si c'est là votre souhait, nous pouvons faire preuve de plus de sévérité envers quiconque est pris en train d'enfreindre la discipline de ce vaisseau. Je tiens cependant à préciser que les prévôts ne sont pas aux ordres du maître-infernus, et que ses actions constituent une violation scandaleuse de la chaîne de commandement ! »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, dilerseniz gemi disiplinindeki tüm ihlallerin üzerine gideriz. Ancak haddimi aşarak belirtmek isterim ki İtfa Üstadı, infazcılara komuta etme hakkına sahip değildir. Eylemlerini de komuta zincirinin ölçüyü aşan bir ihlali olarak görüyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if it be your wish, we will crack down on any violations of the ship's discipline. However, I dare say that the Infernus Master has no right to command the enforcers, and I find his actions to be an outrageous breach of the chain of command!"
